org.tigris.noodle.filters
Class HandleContentType

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.tigris.noodle.filters.HandleContentType
All Implemented Interfaces:
NoodleFilter, NoodleResponseFilter
public class HandleContentType
extends java.lang.Object
implements NoodleResponseFilter

This is a proxy response filter to be run after CheckForRedirect. It determines the content type of the proxy response, and propagates it to the client response. If the content type is binary (non-"text/html"), it disables further filtering.

filter

public int filter(NoodleData data,
                  ResponseBlock block)
           throws java.lang.Exception
Propagate the content type to the client response. Turn off further filtering unless we're delivering HTML data.
Specified by:
filter in interface NoodleResponseFilter

Parameters:
noodleData - Contains miscellaneous storage and information about the request; you can also use this to mantain filter state.

Returns:
